alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 24 at 1:41PM MDT until October 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches above 6000 feet and 1 to 2 feet above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Centennial Mountains, Island Park, Kilgore, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass, and Ashton Hill. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
